title: Launcher will not open, constant bugspalting, temporary fix with a reinstall of leauge
body: MY launcher will not open unless i reinstall leauge even then when i close it, it continues to do this and bugsplats. i have already sent i support ticket to riot but i feel like ill get answers quicker here. i am currently running on windows XP but this is the first time its happened and only start around today around midday
